markdownPage.content:
<!-- 
header_title: BE THE INTERNET
header_image: ./header.png
header_altImg: ''
header_excerpt: We're going back to the original vision of the Internet - By the people, for the people. With industry-transforming technology. And we are already live today. -->

cards.title: Powering the next Technological Era

cards.excerpt: Today's Internet is highly inefficient, unsustainable, exploits user data, and is extremely centralized. ThreeFold started from scratch, and built the Internet infrastructure the worlds need for exponential evolution.

cards.title: A model in which anyone can partake

image.dataUri: data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg fill='none' viewBox='0 0 1351 901' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'%3e%3cdefs%3e%3cfilter id='__svg-blur-a0905bd5400ef93d46bb879ce04425ce'%3e%3cfeGaussianBlur in='SourceGraphic' stdDeviation='40'/%3e%3c/filter%3e%3c/defs%3e%3cimage x='0' y='0' filter='url(%23__svg-blur-a0905bd5400ef93d46bb879ce04425ce)' width='1351' height='901' xlink:href='data:image/jpeg%3bbase64%%2bxzU7m1evT1x60Qj6yvtlwjWGmpTbKeRnW4ds15kDmPr6VTo0AAj4So/M0YYhFQwpTaE%2bArgZ012wHtQ7ilfrPqDhhcHbPco0ratoqQhWFp%2bMdUnmPpTxo9hbukrJtSRuhM8x/TFcPGvRNhOirldW4EYXNrYUyG29iuawDnHXl40kyJGpdL8JLTdbbqV1TM%2bKEiLIjpK4/cSy6OYwMYBz1%2bVb5MhS2GJulFpUUpvC2iP4ih/utEoQha21jouhzi3A8XC4ouZzuJ558c12qWXloePJS8E%2beK6uB0lGlu6G7VE9oQbb5aEeEVR/WaevZpGNHXLCMlU88/wC2ioxxE1d98LrHliL9mSw12SUbs5G4nP503cJeJ8LRdjft8u2SJSnZCn97TiUgApSMYPlS7xL24oeX2TUbou5JJ8V%2bpYqQMfhp9aKMnIACEDHhiorC472hQH7Dnf5EGmS08ZLTLUB7qmoz3lSKRMpYLk0qjOMZtRC/yiPFWDKuzMC1CU9HgykPKkIZwC5sCCkEkHlknpUk4g6UfZ0Wy0q6vuQ7SMtMSMKShJ5bUkJHMnzqnar13bJMdiSw05vjocISvAyVAAD8qg%2btdVXG%2bKKJkjawOjDfwtjHfjPM/M0UHKjkvHaOTgzRtaXjEe/2f4ptKZSD1qgWrSFmn6GlXGJcVyrnFjrcWltZSG1AZCSg8/lnvpJlkEGh6X3WFlTLi21EFJKFEEg9Ry7qqMOQUCdoY7S0h9kvO5IGPWijDrLfRtPmaCReprdxR2daz2ZGkMcmA0E0xLmEEpSGxgdcCiPv1TTOUPBCu7AyDSIFqQVhKiByFahatuMnGenrSj%2bGxxsqpD1SRgoJ0n31S46QJLjxVzIWkADy50ty5naKJJoe%2btW7r%2b8a5lKO3rXSHitZ9EPK6lJKaK2kP5BwTXGo5NeKNfBpxraUh7y82V//2Q==' /%3e%3c/svg%3e

cards.excerpt: Enabling a simple way for anyone to partake in the Internet economy. All you need to get started is a node, plug it into an electricity outlet, and to connect it to your network coverage.

cards.title: The most powerful nodes

cards.excerpt: Get your 3Node now to connect compute and storage capacity on the edge. Our lightwieght & autonomous operating system empowers the builders of the Internet with more freedom, performance & sustainability.

cards.title: The Token of the Internet

cards.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token is used to reserve compute & capacity on the ThreeFold Grid. Dive into the Tokenomics of the medium of exchange of the new Internet economy.

cards.title: Join the Decentralization Movement
